ee 2003 di ohu nishpadanaya kara adhyakshanaya kala ‘janashin’ chitha්rapatayen.thama puth fardin khan da thawath nawaka niliyaka wana megna kothari da boliwud nalu nili waram labuwe feros khan nisayi.1980 di athishaya janapi්rayathwayata pathwu ‘kurbani’ chitha්rapataya adhyakshanaya kale da feros khan.

thama biriya samaga thaman hadunu wadunu gamata yamata thiranaya karanne nawa jiwithayak patan ganmatayi.

tramp palanaya wisin dhanawathun ha maha jawaram karuwange badu kapana gaman ma medikeng (saukhya aadhara) saha aahara muddara kapa damima da, aagamanika kamkaruwanta da wada pulul praja ayithinta da pahara demin podu yuddhamaya prachandathwayata amatharawa nyashtika yuddhaye tharjanaya ella karana thathu thula, miliyana ganan wada karana janaya kotharam akamaththen wuwa da thama chandaya nila “wipakshayata”, enam dimokratik pakshayata laba dimata katayuthu karanu atha.

“golu muhude kunatuwa mul warata nirbhitha saha nirwyaja aasthanayakin janawargika prashnaye adhama swabhawaya makswadi drushtikonayakin palaka panthiyata erehiwa wagawibhaga karayi.eeta pilithuru washayen mahacharya gamlath kiya sitinne me nam labha sinamawakata makswadi lebalaya alawa makswadaya apakirthiyata path kirimedi ruchikathwaya dushanaya kirime da prayathnayak bawaya.mahacharya gamlath, prasanna withanage, ashoka handagama pramukha sinhala sinamawe thunwani karalla niyojanaya karana tharuna sinamakaruwan ge chithrapata sambandhayen da swakiya matha chinthawan dakwa atha.‘chanda kinnari’ salakiya yuthu sinama nirmanayak lesa handunwana mahacharya gamlath eya me dhanawadi samajaye sthrin matha pathitha kota athi durdashawa widaha dakwana bawa da kiyayi.mahacharya kalo fonseka ‘saroja’ chithrapataya gana adahas dakwamin sinhala bauddha sanskruthiye udara bawa me tharam ihalin prakasha karana wenath chithrapatayak daka nathayi kiya sitiyi.

shri lanka sahallu pandu krikat sammelanaye jathika kandayama saha disthrik kandayam athara krikat tharagawaliye palamu tharagaya rathnapura eekabaddha kandayama samaga anidda (4) rathnapura siwali nagara sabha kridanganayedi pawathwe.mita samagamiwa pawathwena perahuru tharagayak heta (3) jathika kandayama saha rathnapura disthrikkaye kahawaththa nihal krikat samajaya samaga pawathwimata niyamithaya.me masa 23-24 dedinada rathnapurayedi anuradhapura, polonnaruwa, badulla, puththalama, mannarama, thrikunamalaya, wawuniyawa, kaluthara, kurunagala, kolambaa uthura ha dakuna disthrik kanadayam samaga jathika kandayama tharaga wadimata niyamithaya.adiyara kihipayak yatathe pawathwena tharagawaliya awasanaye sahallu pandu primiyar lig krikat tharagawaliyak pawathwimata katayuthu karana bawa pradhana krikat widhayaka aar.kumaranayaka mahatha pawasiya.sahallu pandu krikat sammelanaya disthrik mattamin pawathwu dayalog jathika shurathawaliyen thoragath kridakayan 48 dena athurin 20 denekugen jathika kandayama samanwitha we.tharagawaliye samarambhaka uthsawaya shri lanka sahallu pandu krikat sammelanaye sabhapathi saukhya ni.amathi lalith disanayaka, sabaragamu palath sabha manthri ha rathnapura disthrik sangamaye sabhapathi akila saliya ellawala mahathwarun athulu jathika sammelana niladharin pirisakage sahabhagithwayen pawathwe..
